description:
The platform Disney Plus has become a popular streaming destination for fans of classic Disney films and shows, Star Wars projects, and the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Now, however, it looks like Disney Plus could reportedly be cancelling a fan-favorite series. This is far from the first cancellation made by Disney. In fact, the studio is [...]

The post Disney Plus Fan-Favorite Series Reportedly Facing Cancellation appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Disney Plus Fan-Favorite Series Reportedly Facing Cancellation
